traits.name: Amorphous Form
entries: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

traits.name: Corrode Metal
entries: Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative âˆ’1 penalty to damage rolls. if its penalty drops to âˆ’5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage.
White Maw can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

traits.name: Killer Response
entries: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (4d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative âˆ’1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.
